timeline.message:
core: add missing header docstrings

timeline.bodyText: these are actually callbacks specific to the engine, unrelated to streams IIRC

timeline.bodyText: This is a dynamic value that is updated based on OS hooks. This is simply a handle to retrieve the current value.
